Class ConfigurationPanel

java.lang.Object

                                  com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.client.widget.ConfigurationPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.Observable, com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.IconSupport, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, IDetailPanel, IFieldPanel, IDataBound<ConfigurationTemplateDTO>
public class ConfigurationPanel
extends com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.TabItem
implements IDetailPanel, IDataBound<ConfigurationTemplateDTO>

Fieldset that manages the configuration template items for Connectors and portal components.

Forwarded Events:
Select : Forwarded from ComboBox.
Submit : Forwarded from FileUpload.
OnKeyUp : Forwarded from TextFields.
Change : BaseEvent(eventType, ComponentInPageNameEditor)
Forwarded from TextFields and other fields.
  • eventType : Events.Change.
  • ComponentInPageNameEditor : this

Author:
Manuel Ruiz, Andrei Cojocaru
